entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 20 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 13
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY SUNNY
